item.title: Happiness Is a Big, Ugly Sofa
item.description: Buying a new, adult couch in a space of my own felt monumental.

item.title: Trump Has Obliterated America’s 30-Year Courtship of India
item.description: India must decide whether go all in with a capricious Trump or hedge its bets through a rapprochement with China.

item.title: Trump Says He Will Sign Executive Order Mandating Voter I.D.
item.description: He also wants to restrict mail-in voting and allow only paper ballots. The Constitution doesn’t give the president explicit authority over election la...

item.title: A City Reinvented: Paris Is Now Greater Paris
item.description: The periphery of the French capital is more vital than ever, and its creativity and dynamism have blurred old boundaries.

item.title: Suspect in Montana Bar Shooting Faces 4 Murder Charges
